name: synthetics-replicator-tests
description: Browse the directory structure here to see an example skeleton of an [Elastic Synthetics](https://www.elastic.co/observability/synthetic-monitoring) project. Make sure to [read the docs](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/observability/current/monitor-uptime-synthetics.html) as well if you're unfamiliar with Elastic Synthetics.
